attributes.action: People's vote May's deal or No deal if Parliament can not reach a decision on UK
attributes.additional_details: For the sake of Democracy Remain can not be an option. The people have spoken in the largest Democratic vote in UK history, and Parliament have no idea what to do. We should decide our own destiny from here with only two options, May's deal or No deal.
attributes.background:
We have had the vote on Leave or Remain, now if parliament can not reach a decision on behalf of the UK we should have a people's vote with only two options. May's deal or No deal.

These are the only two options that should appear.
